sen.j: 阿蘇海（あそかい、あそのうみ）は京都府宮津市、与謝郡与謝野町にまたがる内海（海跡湖）。
sen.e: Aso-kai or Asonoumi is an inland sea called kaisekiko surrounded by Miyazu City and Yosano-cho Yosano-gun Kyoto Prefecture.
sen.cmt: 一原文一訳文の例外対処
sen.e: Aso-kai or Asonoumi is an inland sea called kaisekiko surrounded by Miyazu City and Yosano-cho Yosano-gun Kyoto Prefecture.
Aso-kai or Asonoumi is an inland sea called kaisekiko surrounded by Miyazu City and Yosano-cho Yosano-gun Kyoto Prefecture.

sen.j: 天橋立によって日本海の宮津湾から仕切られてできた。
sen.e: It is formed by Amanohashidate, which partitions it off Miyazu bay of the Japan sea.
sen.cmt: 一原文一訳文の例外対処
sen.e: It is formed by Amanohashidate, which partitions it from Miyazu bay of the Japan sea.
It is formed by Amanohashidate, which partitions it from Miyazu Bay of the Japan Sea.
sen.cmt: Bay, Sea と大文字にしました。

sen.j: 湾奥には野田川 (京都府)が流入し、宮津湾とは狭い水道でのみつながる。
sen.e: In the closed-section of the bay the Noda-gawa River (Kyoto Pref.) flows out, and the sea water of Miyazu Bay flows in and out only through a narrow aqueduct.
In the closed-section of the bay the Noda-gawa River (Kyoto Pref.) flows out, and the sea water of Miyazu Bay flows in and out only through a narrow aqueduct.
In the closed-section of the bay the Noda-gawa River (Kyoto Prefecture) flows out, and the sea water of Miyazu Bay flows in and out only through a narrow aqueduct.
Water Pollution
Water Pollution
Water pollution

sen.j: 天橋立の風光明媚さとは裏腹に、野田川水系の下水道整備が遅れたため、阿蘇海に流入する川の水質悪化にともない、阿蘇海や天橋立をはさむ宮津湾でも水質汚濁が進んでいる。
sen.e: Although the scenery of Amanohashidate is entrancingly beautiful, the quality of water in the Aso-kai and Miyazu Bay across the Amanohashidate has been increasingly polluted due to the delay of sewage work in Noda-gawa river system.

Although the scenery of Amanohashidate is entrancingly beautiful, the quality of water in the Aso-kai and Miyazu Bay across the Amanohashidate has been increasingly polluted due to the delay of sewage work in Noda-gawa river system.

Although the scenery of Amanohashidate is entrancingly beautiful, the quality of water in the Aso-kai and Miyazu Bay across the Amanohashidate has been increasingly polluted due to the delay of sewage work in Noda-gawa River system, which flows into Aso-kai.

sen.j: 2005年度平均値では阿蘇海で2～3mg/l（宮津湾で1～1.5mg/l）で、年々値が上昇する傾向にある。
sen.e: The mean value of 2005 was 2 -3mg/l in Aso-kai and 1 -1.5mg/l in Miyazu Bay, both of which tend to increase year by year.
sen.cmt: 平均値が何の値であるかがわかりませんでしたが、原文通り訳しました。
sen.e: The mean value of 2005 was 2 -3mg/l in Aso-kai and 1 -1.5mg/l in Miyazu Bay, both of which tend to increase year by year.
The mean value of fiscal year 2005 was 2 -3 mg/l in Aso-kai and 1 -1.5 mg/l in Miyazu Bay, both of which tend to increase year by year.
sen.cmt: fiscal を追加しました。fiscal→fiscal yearに変更

sen.j: 2005年度調査では若狭湾、宮津湾とともに化学的酸素要求量(化学的酸素要求量)が基準未達成であった。
sen.e: The 2005 investigation showed that the value of chemical oxygen demand did not meet the requirement.
sen.cmt: 一原文一訳文の例外対処
sen.e: The 2005 investigation showed that the value of chemical oxygen demand did not meet the requirement.
The fiscal year 2005 investigation showed that the value of chemical oxygen demand did not meet the requirement.
sen.cmt: fiscal を追加しました。fiscal→fiscal yearに変更

sen.j: 潟湖であることから京都府下の若狭湾の窒素・燐排水基準の規制のある海域では富栄養化と有機汚濁が最も深刻である。
sen.e: Since it is a lagoon, eutrophication and organic contamination are the most serious problem in the sea area of Wakasa Bay, Kyoto Pref. where waste water standards for nitrogen and phosphorus are regulated.
sen.cmt: 一原文一訳文の例外対処
sen.e: Since it is a lagoon, eutrophication and organic contamination are the most serious problem in the sea area of Wakasa Bay, Kyoto Pref. where waste water standards for nitrogen and phosphorus are regulated.

Since it is a lagoon, eutrophication and organic contamination are the most serious problem in the sea area of Wakasa Bay, Kyoto Prefecture where waste water standards for nitrogen and phosphorus are regulated.
